title: Coach K, Selena Gomez Sanity, Hood Weekend At Bernies, Selfies and more.
itunes:title: Coach K, Selena Gomez Sanity, Hood Weekend At Bernies, Selfies and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  We get a special message straight from the pulpit today.  The Chief Love Officer educates to say the least.  "The pen is mightier than the sword."  There is a specific thing that Steve brings up that gets in the way of all that is selfie related!  Who will replace Coach K at Duke?  Is there a Hood version of Weekend at Bernies?  Carla reports on the Big Show.  How does one stay sane with over 300 million followers on IG?  Would You Rather round takes it to the limit.  Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve has advice for those that are co-parenting.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
